name: Space Craft TD
description:
The game takes some time to load, so be patient :)

Defend your Ship against an Alien force that wants to destroy it! Place turrets on the nodes and upgrade them.

Hint: The enemies grow stronger (more health) on each wave, so having more turrets or upgrading them is a muss!

Feel free to leave any comment, any advice is greatly appreciated so I can keep on working on the game!
